title: How to SSH into my Raspberry Pi - Quora

response.answer_text: Set the SSH interface check box in the configuration app and connect via putty as pi / raspberry (or other user you create). Of course you need to enter IP address to the putty, you can find if by ifconfig utility. And of course your raspberry has to be connected to LAN, i.e. plug cable to ethernet connector or through keyboard and monitor select suitable wifi and enter its password (just the first time).
